episodes.title: Meet Candice Morgan (Leaving a Cult & Prumble)
episodes.description:
Welcome to Episode 392 of Your Morning Drive, a Hammerhead Creations original show.

This show is brought to you by ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fireworks Coworking⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ in Marietta, GA. Use code DRIVE when booking them and you will get a free day pass. 

Candice Morgan was Born and raised in California within a strict religious cult, her life took an unexpected turn when she married young to a man, leading her to a life of poverty in rural Mexico. Grappling with her husband's alcoholism, she made the bold decision to leave, relocating to Georgia only to discover she was pregnant. The year 2020 marked a pivotal moment as she courageously left the cult and finalized her divorce, unleashing her potential. Remarkably, she doubled her income annually for four consecutive years, discovering an unexpected talent in sales honed by her years of religious conversion efforts. Today, she stands at a crossroads of self-discovery, unpacking her complex journey - a testament to resilience, growth, and the power of breaking free from constraining circumstances to forge a new path in life.

Together we discuss Halloween parties, drug cartels, moving to GA to start fresh, leaving a cult, finding your gift, dialects, Prumble & much more.
